lines.text: [the spirit of Mufasa shows his plan to bring peace to the Pridelander/Outlander feud]
What? Kovu, Kiara together? This is the plan? Are you crazy? This will never work! Oh Mufasa, you've been up there too long, your head is in the clouds!
[Kiara and Kovu are stargazing]
I've never done this before.
Really? My father and I used to do this all the time. He says all the great kings of the past are up there.
You think Scar's up there?
[Shocked, Kiara doesn't answer]
He wasn't my father, but he was still part of me.
My father said there was a darkness in Scar that he couldn't escape.
Maybe there's a darkness in me too.
Pumbaa, let me define BABY-SITTING!
[Rehearsing speaking to Simba]
The good news is, we found your daughter. The bad news is, we dropped a warthog on her.
Stay out of this!
A wise king once told me, we are one. I didn't understand him then. Now I do.
But they...
Them? Us. Look at them, they are us. What differences do you see?
I humbly ask to join your pride.
No! You were banished, along with the outsiders.
I have left the outsiders. I'm a rogue, judge me now, for who I am. Or am I to be blamed for a crime I didn't commit?
[Being chased by lions]
What do we do now?
"When the going gets tough, the tough get going!"
Wait a minute, I thought our motto was "Hakuna Matata".
Pumbaa, stop living in the past. We need a new motto!
[Timon and Pumbaa are fighting]
What are you doing?
Ahh!
Good question. Uh, let me ask you one.
Hippothetically.
Very hypothetically. There's this guy...
But he's not a lion...
No. No, he's not a lion. Yeesh, definitely not a lion... and uh... uh, his daughter, um, say... vanished?
[Kovu just rescued Kiara from the wildfire]
Where am I?
You're safe - in the Pride Lands.
The Pride Lands? No! Why'd you bring me here? Who do you think you are?

[shocked]
I think I'm the one that just saved your life!
That's not a king. That's a fuzzy maraca!
[Kiara and Kovu are running with Timon and Pumbaa]
Why are we doing this? What's the point of this training?
Training? This is just for fun!
Fun?
Yeesh! You need to get out more. Fun! Yee-ha!
[Timon and Pumbaa are surrounded by Lions]

[holding Pumbaa's tail]
Don't anybody move! This things loaded... I'll let you have it!
[Kovu pounces, only to realize Timon is there]
AHHH! Don't eat me, please! I... I never really met your tyrant, I mean, uh, Scar! Scar, oh heck of a guy. A little moody, but...
Timon, what are you doing here?

Kiara! Thank goodness! Oh. Hey, for once, we're not following you. This just happens to be the best smorgasbord in the Pride Lands! Bugs everywhere! But, you don't call for a reservation and... yeesh!
I never heard the story of Scar that way... he truly was a killer.
Fire is a killer. Sometimes what's left behind can grow back better than the generation before
[swipes paw over dust to reveal a small plant]
if given the chance.

[talking to himself]
Okay, I have to tell her today. Oh, where do I start? "Kiara, Zira had a plot, and I was part of it, but I don't want to be... because... it's because I love you."
It's over, Simba! I have dreamed of nothing else for years!

[speaking to himself]
Boy, does she need a hobby.

[about letting Kovu return to the Pridelands]
Daddy, please! Reconsider!
You will not go anywhere without an escort from now on.
No! That's not ...
He used you to get to me!
No! He loves me, for *me*!
Because you are *my* daughter! You will not leave Pride Rock. You will stay where I can keep an eye on you - away from him!
You don't know him!
I know he's following in Scar's pawprints, and I must follow in my father's.
You will *never* be Mufassa!
[Simba is horrified; Kiara runs off, crying]

[though she and Kovu fight and he prepares to leave, Kiara continually faces him]
What are you *doing*?
My father says never to turn your back on an Outsider!
And do you always do what your father says?
NO!
Bet ya do! Bet your Daddy's little girl!
Oh Mufasa, you've been up there too long! Your head is in the clouds!
Where's your pretty daughter, Nala?
Will somebody please just listen to me?
I'm sorry, I wasn't listening. Did you say something, Princess?
I thought you were gonna watch her
No, *you* were going to watch her.
Watch this!
[tackles him]
Take that, you creepy warthog! Say it, fat! Fatty fat fat.
Kiara!
Kovu!
Stay out of this!
Daddy, this has to stop.
You're even more pathetic than you are. Get out of the way!
You won't hurt Kirara or Simba! Not while I'm here.
Why are you doing this?
A wise king once told me, "We are one." I didn't understand him then. But now I do.

[points out where the grass has grown back from the fire, between them]
Hey, look... we are one.
What?
Let's get outta here. We'll run away together! And start a pride... all our own.
Kovu... we have to go back.
You're kidding. But we're finally together!
Our place is with our pride. If we run away, they'll be divided forever.
I'm not *just* a princess, you know. That's only *half* of who I am!
Oh, who's the other half?
Umm... uhh...

[he and Pumbaa narrowly escape being trampled by a herd of antelope]
This must be where the deer and the antelope play!
Them? Us? Look at them... they *are* us! What differences do you see?
What is your destiny?
I will avenge Scar. Take his place in the Pride Lands.
Yes! What have I taught you?
Simba is the enemy.
And What... must... do?
I must *kill* him!
You follow old Rafiki! He knows the way!
Where are you taking us?
To a special place in your heart called... Upendi!
[Kiara and Kovu are stargazing]
That one looks like a cute bunny. See the fluffy tail?
Yeah. Hey! That one looks like two lions killing each other for a scrap of meat! Ah, I've never done this before!
As long as you live here, it's who you are,. You'll understand someday.
Well done, Kovu. Just like we've always planned.
You!
No! I didn't have anything to do with this!
Attack!

[singing]
If there's so much I must be, can't I still just be me, the way I am?
Well done, my son. We are one.
[while surrounding himself in a ring of fire with his torch]
Roasty-toasty princess! Roasty-toasty princess!
[Stops]
Hey, is it hot in here or is it just me?
[Notices he's in a ring of... ]
FIRE!
[to Vitani]
If you will not fight, then you will die as well.
Stand aside.
Daddy, this has to stop.
[Kovu growls at Zira]
Stay out of this.
A wise king once told me, "We are one." I didn't know what that meant. But now I do.
But- they-
[about Kiara]
Simba, who does she remind you of?
What? Who?
She's just like you when you were young.
Exactly!
I want you to keep a close watch on Kiara. You know she's bound to run off.
No worries, Simba. We're on her like stink on a warthog.
Hey!
It's the hard truth, Pumbaa. Live with it.
Zira.
Simba.
Nala.
Zira.
Timon, Pumbaa. Great, Now that we all know each other, Get out of our Pride Lands!
